name: QrPngCanvasVignetteOptions
summary: Edge vignette options for the canvas background.

properties.name: ProtectQrArea
properties.summary: When true, never draws inside the QR area.

properties.name: QrAreaAlphaMax
properties.summary: Maximum alpha allowed inside the QR area when CodeGlyphX.Rendering.Png.QrPngCanvasVignetteOptions.ProtectQrArea is false. Set to 0 to apply no alpha limit.
